name: Sharp Blu-ray Player Firmware File
summary: An RVP file is a firmware file used by Sharp Blu-ray players, primarily BD-HP20U players. It contains a firmware update to improve the performance of a Blu-ray player and keep up with technological advancements. RVP files are used for a variety of updates such as the playback of movies released by certain studios or the clarity of audio.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
